reviews.review: 強すぎるとBANされる神ゲー
挺不错、希望越做越好

游戏的匹配机制很不好，容易卡掉线，还有一些地图bug，有的时候翻窗不连贯，和好友一起匹配很容易掉。希望游戏开发商抓紧修改优化！！！还有，屠夫太强势，玩人类的越来越少，导致有时候匹配不到人，希望游戏可以平衡！
------------------------分割线-----------------------
2017/1/24修改
--游戏画面很不错，游戏体验很刺激，虽然对新手不友好，但是线上对战游戏没几个对新手友好的吧。
--游戏虽然有很多问题，虽然国区玩家这样那样，但经过一段时间的磨练，你也会觉得这游戏很有意思。杀机CG里的一句话：“死亡并不是解脱。”的确，生活中的各种事情，在这个游戏都会体验出来。
--屠夫套路着逃生者，逃生者也套路着屠夫。
“Death is not an escape，而是明知道快死之前还在被凌辱。”
------------------------分割线-----------------------
2017/2/16修改
最近版本大概一波，游戏的引擎换了。
--先从优化来说，画面更清晰，地图可以从头看到尾，之前的地图加载以后会有空白，除非你跑完图。所以就这点来说，杀机的制作组已经是对这个游戏花了很多心思。
但是，可能因为优化的问题，很多地方还是有空气障碍，例如侧边修电机会卡住出去的位置，地面的层次不齐导致人类和屠夫跑动的时候会有小瑕疵。
然后还是有一些BUG没有修复，救人的时候踩夹子，有时候会导致钩上的人死亡。
其实还有很多小BUG，以后尽力把这些BUG总结起来，让这个游戏越来越好。

Вроде завезли Co-op, завозят новые шмотки, скоро завезут маньяка нового... Да, баги. Да, система рейтинга бесполезна и её можно легко абузить. Вы ждали идеальную игру, которая будет без багов, без проблем с серваками? Ха, вы слишком много требуете, диванные критики! Так что не советую смотреть на отрицательные отзывы, таких "критиков" я найду в каждом дворе!

Я очень давно ждал симулятора пилы(в BattleNet была такая же по смыслу игра и мне она ужасно нравилась), и вот я дождался. За выжившего охреневаешь от каждого шага убийцы, и пытаешься не запаниковать и выжить. За маньяка ты ликуешь, когда мясо приходит к тебе само! От такого лютого треша я в восторге!

Вот несколько способов поймать трешачок:

1. Застряньте в холме вместе с маньяком.
2. Станьте слугой Существа, в прямом смысле оказавшись внутри крюка.
3. Заперитесь в шкафу изнутри так, чтобы маньяк не смог вас достать.
4. Упадите настолько неудачно, что ни другие выжившие, ни маньяк не станут вас поднимать.

Так что ловите кайф от багов, а не гоните на них, ведь в скором време их может не стать!

10 офигевающих маньяков из 10 охреневших выживших!
挺好玩的

Признаться, когда я только узнал о выходе Dead by Daylight, я не собирался ее покупать, описание и ролик просто не зацепили, да и цена показалась завышенной. Оригинальная идея казалась невоплотимой, начиная от общей механики игры и заканчивая различными мелочами. Игру я купил по чистой случайности, друг уговорил, и ни чуть не пожалел о покупке.

В начале, честно говоря, было не по себе, я постоянно ходил вдоль стенки на корточках, побаивался маньяка и редко нормально мог попадать в мини-играх, но буквально через несколько часов игры ко многому привык, и даже маньяк перестал быть чем-то страшным. 

В игре приятная, качественная графика, при этом игра не слишком требовательная. Игровая механика не сложная, однако, что бы начать хорошо играть, придётся понять некоторые тонкости и изучить кое-какие основные тактики.  Игра на удивление не приедается и не надоедает даже после многих часов геймплея (лично мне точно). Честно говоря, в игре еще есть некоторые шероховатости, однако разработчики активно трудятся над улучшением игры. Доказательствами этого могут служить стримы разработчиков (да и вообще их наличие) и часто выходящие патчи.

Итог: уникальная в своем роде игра, не имеющая пока что нормальных аналогов, с достойной графикой и приятным геймплеем. Подтверждением того, что игра хорошая и интересная, может стать активность сообщества проявленная к Dead by Daylight. Лично я, ничуть не жалею о недавней покупке, и хочу сказать, что игра полностью стоит своих денег.

Great game concept.  I really want to like it, and I am not writing it off yet, but there is such little content.  If you've played one hour, you've played it all.  It gets boring very fast. "Depth" has much more replay value, and is the same 4v1 concept.  I hope they add more to this, but as of right now, the game has balance issues, playability issues for many people, and most of the little quirks and add-ins they have don't make much sense/aren't well explained.  Tie this in with a comminuty of players that are about to start junior highschool, and you get a very underwhelming experience. Wait for sale or wait for new content.

i started playing this game when it first game out. it was loads of fun to me back then and there were many days where i would just sit and play this game all day even if i had nobody to play with. it was so exciting to see all the new killers released and i was stoked with every new dlc. it was a very welcoming game to newcomers and i got so many of my friends into it, and all of them to this day still (occasionally) play it. however.. for me, i can not say that i like this game anymore.

yes, the older versions had a few bugs here and there, and the leveling system was very tacky... but it was a lot more rewarding to grind, and it felt so good to prestige characters. now, there is little to no reason to prestige characters, their 
3 perks are just handed to you, and the game overall just feels completely different. back when i played all the time, i managed to get to full pip rank 1 in just a couple days. i was so excited that my hundreds of hours led me to that point. but how you pip in this game now is so tedious. you're required to do certain tasks, such as fixing gens, saving/helping/healing others, escaping... which i get it, you should have to work to pip, but when i got to rank 1 a year or so back when the system was different, i found myself in so many games where the killer barely managed to hook one survivor. despite that, i would still pip because i managed to fix gens, outsmart the killer, and escape. now, that won't help you pip at all. 

even though i used to love this game at one point, i really don't recommend it for people who are either returning, or are looking for a nice survive and escape game, because all you'll be in this game in its current standing is tunneled and presented with new cosmetics that make no sense with the environment because you'll be this bright pink feng min in a dark blue map.

I like the game. I really do, it's just that there is no balancing system in the game. There was countless rounds where I wanted to destroy all of humanity. This game is hard at first but you'll get the hang of it. This is one of those games that I do and don't recommend. Play it for your self.

I don't know how they would go about doing this but if it doesn't stop it's going to ruin the game. Also would like to see in the future:

-Many many different maps and killers
-Voice chat
-Different objectives

<转>《黎明杀机》新的更新让不少玩家很期待，相信大家都有自己不同的看法，这里带来了“gundamsaw”分享的《黎明杀机》新版更新削无敌房体验心得，一起来看下吧。

　　首先，万众期待的汉化，只能说垃圾汉化，纯属敷衍，应付差事。
　　夹子屠夫不能重叠放夹子是一大削弱，特别是被破坏的夹子地方不能再放夹子非常头疼。但是综合无敌房削弱，夹子屠夫并不能算削弱，只是在屠夫中的优势地位降了，另两个屠夫的地位提高了。
　　关于最主要的一点无敌房被削。首先无敌房本来就是一种BUG，制作人打一开始压根就没想到会有这么一种能让人类无限和屠夫周旋的地点，无敌房的存在本来就出乎制作人的意料。这个建筑的存在本意是让人通过绕，来摆脱屠夫，而不是用来跟屠夫耗耐心，让屠夫耗不住了而摆脱屠夫。一帮人在那边把使用BUG当成理所当然，并在那边通过熟练使用BUG来显摆自己技术很牛逼。。。呵呵，这帮怂B现在不是弃坑就是转玩屠夫，只有小部分在研究新版本人类生存之道。
　　削无敌房是肯定需要的，但是现在这种削弱的做法对吗?我觉得是很有问题的。现在单纯往几个窗户上钉几个木板，感觉真的很可笑。一些无敌房的修改应该从一些尺寸以及玩家判断屠夫位置难度上去入手。有些地方把窗户改成门，增加木板。适当增加障碍物，增加木板。下面举例子。
　　公交车，这个其实本来就不安全，这个点的改动可以从微调尺寸入手，让车头-中间-车尾的距离更容易翻车，就行了
　　船头，也是调整一下门到窗的距离，或者在窗户里外增加能阻挡视线的障碍物，让人在安全距离内判断不了屠夫方位。
　　三扇窗，可以把中间的窗户封死，在里外增加阻挡视线的障碍物
　　两层小楼，这个可以把其中一个窗变成门，增加木板，再在屋内放一点点档视线的障碍物，比如不透光的墙。
　　矿坑现在是在边上加了障碍，意思应该是屠夫翻窗追，在这个距离能勉强追上，要真这样，是可以的。
　　猪肉树，现在的改动可以的，但是应该多放点板子。
　　屠宰场大房子改的也真垃圾，单单调整一下窗户的位置就可以了，封个毛线窗户，一个大房间根本完全没有进来的必要了。
　　反正现在无敌点我觉得削得很失败。
　　还有一点，屠夫视野变差了，浓雾的影响变大了，对鹰眼的阻碍大很多，之前在鹰眼面前，浓雾和黑夜都没什么用，现在不一样了。

Découvert grâce aux pitreries d'un streamer bien connu, ce petit jeu qui à mon sens est passé inaperçu, est pourtant hyper efficace en son genre.

Qui n'a jamais rêvé de jouer un petit film d'horreur entre amis ? Moi, je n'y avais jamais pensé, et c'est aussi ça qui re,d le jeu attrayant : c'est frais ! Un jeu de cache-cache multijoueur à 5 : un qui joue l'un des trois tueurs (avec chacun leur specificité; coucou la tronçonneuse), et 4 survivants.

Et survivants c'est le bon mot : ils n'ont rien pour éliminer le tueur. Juste de quoi se soigner, fuir, aider quelques joueurs en detresse, mais voilà, ce n'est que la ruse qui leur ouvrira la porte vers la liberté. On est toujours tiraillé entre le désir de sortir de cet enfer ou aider une victime à descendre du crochet sur lequel la mort le guette, à coté duquel le tueur rôde encore.

A cela s'ajoute une petite dimmension RPG avec un arbre de progression, des compétences.

Bref, frais, grisant, stressant, je ne m'en lasse pas.
I have to say, the team has really worked hard to make this game great and perhaps award winning. Definitely recommend buying!

You'd think that going around with bear traps and a meat cleaver hunting teenagers in the woods would be fun, right? Not exactly. As it stands right now this game can be fun, but generally isn't. Hackers infest every game so that hunting as the killer is no fun. The survivors can simply disarm traps or wiggle off of the hooks which makes all the time you put into catching them wasted. Ranking up has no real value as you don't get to really keep any of the perks plus the survivors become way too overpowered after awhile so those perks become useless. Overall the game is a huge mess that while a game or two can be fun with the right people, is generally not balanced enough to keep you interested for long.

I'd say get it if you have a couple buddies who are willing to play it with you occasionally, but I wouldn't recommend it otherwise.

So I recently went back to the Dead by Daylight page, only to find I had left a negative review. And I have to say, they have adressed nearly all of the issues I had with the game since then. Though the game isn't perfect, most of its problems stem from the community, which is much better than just having a broken game.

There's not a whole lot of in game glitches. They happen from time to time, but I haven't gotten stuck in a wall/hook since October of last year, which is a major improvement from the game at the start. Also, a system has been put in place to try to catch cheaters and to report people who engage in toxic behavior. THE DEVS ARE LISTENING!

Though I question the pricepoints of the DLC packs, I have to say that I'm impressed with how much the devs are pumping out good content for the game. Aside from the whole second chapter, every single one of them has been of high quality (in fact they keep getting better). And on top of that, the devs have stated that they are going to redo the entire swamp map and have buffed the hag since release to make her not entirely useless.

I can't say how glad I am that I stuck with this game. Though I have to say if you do go to buy it, be prepared for a somewhat toxic community. There are issues with the game like I said, but again, most of them come from the community. Though it sucks and I don't always have a good tiem with the game when I play it, I don't think it's fair to fault the developers for it.

Oh and the 1.5 update optimized the shit out of the game so that it actually runs well on my card even on bigger maps :D

Overall, I give it like a 7/10. It's more fun when with friends, but if you're looking for a grindy asymetrical MMO type game to sink your teeth into, this is it!

[B][h1]Cons:[/h1][/B] 
I'm starting with the negatives to get them out of the way. The game INFRASTRUCTURE feels very much so like a beta. To clarify, games are hosted by the killer. This means that the connection and latency are determined by a peer to peer connection instead of a stable server wide host that maintains a universally smooth experience. The RANKING system in my opinion is terrible and leaves much to be desired. The ranking is based off of points instead of purely objective based merit. This means that sacrificing 2-3 players as a killer doesn't guarantee you enough points to rank up if you don't chase them enough, or attack them enough times, or use your killer secondary mechanic enough. (Survivor point of view - If you are running the killer around distracting the killer while your team repairs generators and then you all escape in most cases that survivor won't net enough points to gain a rank because you didn't repair enough generators even though you played an integral part in helping your team escape.) The 3rd con that I really feel is a major issue at the moment is the overall bloodweb experience in the game which equates to a talent system. That poor ranking system I referenced gives you bloodpoints based on the points you accumulate during the game and then you spend them in this "talent tree" to gain add-ons, perks, and items that you can use in the game to modify your game experience accordingly. The values of many of the "picks" are very boring, and don't really feel as worth the investment in many cases. There are also many perks that are lack luster in favor of others considering you may only pick 4.

[U]TLDR:[/U]
[list]
[*]Bad hosting / Connection System [Hosted by killers]
[*]Awful ranking system that really doesn't determine skill when you see player rank [Opinion]
[*]Bloodweb needs an overhaul on values / choices. Point gains and accumulation should be looked at/modified
[/list]


[B][H1]Pros:[/H1][/B]
I literally have played like 70 hours of this game in only 4 days. For me, this game is one of those games that hooks you and then keeps you addicted for many many hours and days. It's very challenging and has progression over a multitude of characters and has very interesting lore and unique gameplay aspects that no other survival horror game offers I.E (Asymmetrical 1v4 experience and a CHOSEN cooperative experience just to name a few.) The devs haven't personally reached out to me even though I've contacted them on several occasions with questions or feedback which is unfortunate but i'm sure many have done the same. During the twitch streams they do once per week currently they seem to at least listen to some community feedback regardless of whether they seem to value it. The game has received as far as i'm aware 3-4 patches in only a months time and some days which is very good news for the player base. The studio has mentioned on a few occasions that they are in it for the long haul ("marathon") and will continue to make improvements to the game as time goes on. In a nut shell, for a game priced at $20.00 I can promise that you have plenty of entertainment with this game to warrant a twenty dollar purchase and many more hours after that. With a game that has obviously been packed with many hours of love, passion, and many sick minds, Dead By Daylight is definitely one to try for $20.00. 

[U]TLDR:[/U]
[list]
[*]Buy the game
[*]Buy the game
[*]Addicting Gameplay
[*]Versatile ways to play
[*] Great lore / Vivid graphics
[*]Unique gameplay
[*]Frequently Updated
[*]Weekly twitch stream from Devs
[*]Worth a $20.00 investment
[*]Reaper VX's Seal Of Approval
[*]Buy the game

[I]Seal of Approval is very hard to achieve![/I]

В игре находятся 4 выживающих и 1 маньяк, у каждого из них своя роль.
Задача выживающих-активировать 5 генераторов,разбросанных по всей карте,
чтобы открыть двери и выбежать с закрытой территории,на которой находится маньяк,который должен 
поймать всех выживших и обездушить их или пока они не умрут.
Игра подойдет для игры с друзьями ,как и одному. +REP

Wait it out until all the bugs & unfair matchmaking is settled. 

This was an early access game released as a full game & instead of patching the nuisances that occasionaly happen like:

- Frequent glue spots in the map that neither the killer nor survivor can get out of
- Getting hit by the killer in certain games and being unable to heal past 50% HP.
- Parts of the map NOT loading in until later in the game
- Hillbilly being able to chainsaw you through certain walls on occassion 
- No ping limiter, which means extremely laggy killers being the host who in turn pick the Trapper to take advantage of it 
- Losing pips if the killer disconnects & deranking if your game decides to crash
- Absurd lag during skill checks 

I honestly enjoyed this ranking up as the survivior in the beginning (rank 10) but eventually you get fustrated because there is nothing you can do as a survivor once all the pallets are dropped to defend yourself from the killer if you decide to try & get atleast 12k points for a rank pip.

Juking them is nearly impossible when the higher ranks have perks that can alert them to when youre nearby so this game is purely based on luck as the survivor.

Ontop of that certain defense items like the flash light dont work as intended. 

The devs and half of the community approve of the killer constantly being buffed, if you plan on strictly playing the killer then this game is for you. 

Otherwise just avoid it, its not worth your time and fustration considering your rank gets reset every month.

I will not bore you with the "This game is survivor sided" thing. But it is. You can have 10k hours and be a killer main, you will stil lose 8/10 games because survivors do well on every map, while a killer is map dependent.

The community is very toxic (in my opinion, it's even more toxic than League of Legends, for example). You will get insulted, t-bagged, face camped, tunneled.

If you will buy this game you will waste your money (and that's ok, it's your decision and maybe you want to find out yourself if this game is fun) and your time (the rarest resource a human being has). 
This game will not make you happy, this game will make you angry. Altough it has some funny/good moments. 

Buy it and find for yourself or don't. It's your choice!
still a good game but killer melee should be nerf

Avis positif : 

Un jeu qui fais très peur niveau horreur, le stress est très bien gérer car quand le tueur est proche de vous vous avez peur votre coeur bat très fort en tout cas pour ma part, le système de générateur est très bien réaliser, le système des coffres pour trouver un medic kit ou autre chose est vraiment pas mal, les planches et les fenêtres et batiments pour brain le tueur est vraiment très bien fais je trouve, les personnages sont bien fais, niveau vestimentaires cheveux et j'en passe, les map sont bien sombre se qui rends très convivial pour les joueurs sa fais plus penser à un jeu d'horreur, également le sang qu'on lache par-terre.

Avis négatif : 

Trop de bug, nous gémission quand nous somme touché ce qui fais que nous sommes repérable facilement dans les casiers ou quand on ce cache, trop de bug le tueur nous rush comme ça on ne sais pas d'où il viens, les tueurs qui campes, les dévs que se magne pas le cul pour le jeu, il devient de plus en plus dure. :/

- Enfin voilà, ce n'est qu'un avis de ma part.
